ygData.subject: Sash quests & Qeynos monks
ygData.msgSnippet: Alternatively, since the first few sash quests are item quests, you can get the sashes without needing faction by asking a Freeport Monk to turn them in for
ygData.messageBody:
Alternatively, since the first few sash quests are "item" quests, you can
get the sashes without needing faction by asking a Freeport Monk to turn
them in for you.

I performed this favour for a visting Qeynos Monk, who was kind enough to
pay me with the Legionnaire Bracer I needed as the last item for my Orange
sash!

- Steve

>From: "Brian Wood" <exodus019@...>
>
>You have to raise your faction. Ive found one way to raise faction with
>the
>ashen order, but i don't know how many times you have to do it to get good
>enough faction with ashen order to get sash. It is the tomer quest! In
>qeynos there is a quest to find tomer (saying that seta sent you to find
>him) and take him to the guild. I only did it 2-3 times and wasn't able to
>do, so i dunno.
>
